data.persona: I am the prince to the king. I am the rightful heir to the throne. I need to marry a young princess.
data.description:
You are in the King's Bedroom.
The more-than-king-sized bed is the dominating feature of this room.  It has four tall posters, draped in the most royal blue canopy that you could imagine.  The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk his artisans could get their hands on.  Next to the bed is a lavish desk piled high with books.  On the other side of the room is a fireplace and a chair, and yet another pile of books.  [The King is an avid, AVID reader.]
There's a shelf, a more-than-king-sized bed, a couch, a chair,, a book, a desk, an a chamber pot, discreetly hidden, and a royal blue canopy here.
The queen and the a chambermaid are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the chambermaid my gratitude
data.mid_motivation: I am happy that the chambermaid cleaned my room and want to ask the chambermaid to clean the play room next
data.long_motivation: I need to make my chambermaid happy so the chambermaid continues to keep my room clean
